knimeNode.name: BED ∩ VCF
knimeNode.shortDescription: Computes the intersection between a BED and a VCF table

fullDescription.intro:
Computes the intersection between a BED table and a VCF table. Both tables must be sorted on chromosome/position. NULL values will be appended to the Unmatched VCF rows.
References
Knime4Bio. Author: Pierre Lindenbaum PhD, INSERM UMR 915, Institut du thorax, Nantes. Reference: manuscript in preparation. Please, report any problem here.
